message.body: I'm going to need your help. Lots of it.
On what???

I'm going to be writing a paper on Keanu. It's like a major project. I need to do a lot of research on stuff like people's response to traumatic events and collective grieving, but I also need to collect people's memories of him and that day
Oh! Sure thing.
Do you think that's a bad idea?
Absolutely not! Just idk about how much help i would be.

You'd be a great help. This assignment is like half research paper and half creative writing. It's a weird thing. I'm not sure what direction I'll take it in yet but I'd appreciate being able to talk things through with you
Sorry! Accident. I would love to, seriously.
No problem. Awesome! Thaaaanks <3
Another Skype sesh this weekend perhaps?
Yes! Ill let you know, though, cause i have a chem test monday.
Okayyyyyy
WHen's it due by?
The end of the term lololol
Oh, we're gonna make it nobel-prize worthy.
Hellz yeah
Would it be possible for us to talk today or tonight over any medium?
Im in troy! Dont get back till 1AM
Whaaaat? Ok that's fine we can talk tomorrow? Also what are you doing there till 1??
Volleyball, yo. Also, i have to study and write an essay, so idk if we'll have time.
Ok that's fine. We'll figure it out
